name: Checkit V7
description: AI-powered operations management platform for food manufacturing, distribution centers, and quality control operations. Features conversational form building, AI vision-based form filling, voice-to-form capture, supply chain traceability, and real-time compliance monitoring.
releaseNotes: Production-ready platform with AI vision, voice capture, FSMA 204 compliance tools, and temperature monitoring.

capabilities.name: AI-Powered Conversational Form Builder
capabilities.description: Describe forms in natural language, AI instantly generates fully functional forms with validation in 30 seconds. Cursor-like streaming UX with real-time preview.
capabilities.problem: Traditional form builders require 5-10 minutes of manual drag-and-drop work
capabilities.solution: Natural language form generation with AI chat interface reduces creation time to 30 seconds

capabilities.name: AI Vision-Based Form Filling
capabilities.description: Point camera at equipment, labels, or environments - AI automatically fills form fields by analyzing visual context. 10x faster than manual entry.
capabilities.problem: Frontline workers waste 12+ hours per week manually entering inspection data
capabilities.solution: Camera-based auto-fill extracts data from images (temperatures, equipment status, lot codes) and populates forms automatically

capabilities.name: Voice-to-Form Recording
capabilities.description: Click record, speak naturally, watch questions answer themselves in real-time. 3-2-1 countdown start, live progress tracking, animated waveform visualization.
capabilities.problem: Valuable frontline observations and insights go undocumented during inspections
capabilities.solution: Voice recording with AI transcription and form field mapping. Structured data + unstructured commentary captured simultaneously.

capabilities.name: FSMA 204 Supply Chain Traceability
capabilities.description: Visual supply chain flow showing complete FDA-compliant process from vendor to production to shipping. Lot code traceability, batch record linking, and 24-hour recall response capability.
capabilities.problem: Manual lot tracking with paper and spreadsheets makes FDA compliance impossible at scale
capabilities.solution: Automated lot code generation, ingredient-to-product linking, forward/backward traceability, and supply chain visualization for prepared foods

capabilities.name: Temperature Monitoring & Sensor Integration
capabilities.description: Automated temperature monitoring with Disruptive Technologies sensor integration. Real-time alerts, voice-to-text probing, and predictive violation warnings.
capabilities.problem: Manual temperature checks are time-consuming and violations are discovered too late
capabilities.solution: IoT sensor integration with automated data capture, smart alerts, and voice-based corrective action logging

capabilities.name: Menu-to-Label Automation
capabilities.description: Upload menu photo, AI extracts ingredients, calculates shelf-life (FIFO), and generates print-ready labels in 2 minutes. Direct Zebra printer integration.
capabilities.problem: Creating ingredient labels manually takes hours and is error-prone
capabilities.solution: AI-powered ingredient intelligence with automated label generation and direct printer output

capabilities.name: Real-Time Commentary Feed
capabilities.description: Social feed UI displaying voice commentary from inspections. Trending issue detection, location filtering, and action buttons (Flag Issue, Add to Form, Reply, Recognize).
capabilities.problem: Valuable frontline observations are scattered and not actionable
capabilities.solution: Centralized feed with trending analysis, pattern detection, and quick action capabilities

capabilities.name: AI Reverse Engineering
capabilities.description: Analyzes commentary patterns from last 30 days, identifies recurring themes, and suggests new form questions automatically.
capabilities.problem: Forms become stale and don't capture emerging issues or changing operations
capabilities.solution: AI analyzes unstructured commentary to surface patterns and recommend form improvements

capabilities.name: Excel Upload to Digital Forms
capabilities.description: Upload existing Excel or CSV forms, AI converts them to digital forms with proper field types and validation.
capabilities.problem: Organizations have hundreds of Excel-based forms that need digitization
capabilities.solution: One-click upload converts spreadsheets to functional digital forms

competitiveDifferentiators.checkit: Real-time transcription with structured + unstructured capture
competitiveDifferentiators.advantage: Captures valuable insights that would otherwise be lost

competitiveDifferentiators.checkit: Built-in supply chain visualization and lot traceability
competitiveDifferentiators.competitors: Generic form tools with no compliance features

competitiveDifferentiators.advantage: Automated data collection from physical environment

useCases.title: Food Manufacturing Compliance
useCases.description: Distribution centers producing prepared foods need FSMA 204 compliance, lot traceability, and efficient inspections.
useCases.beforeState: Paper forms, manual lot tracking, 12+ hours/week on data entry, impossible to trace ingredients quickly
useCases.afterState: Digital forms with AI vision, automated lot codes, voice inspections, 24-hour recall capability
useCases.roi: 80% reduction in inspection time, 100% compliance readiness

useCases.title: Quality Assurance Inspections
useCases.description: QA teams conducting daily inspections of equipment, cleanliness, and temperature compliance.
useCases.beforeState: Clipboard forms, photos in separate systems, manual transcription, missing observations
useCases.afterState: Camera-based auto-fill, voice commentary capture, real-time feed of issues, trending analysis

useCases.title: Cold Storage Temperature Monitoring
useCases.description: Facilities with temperature-controlled environments need continuous monitoring and rapid response to violations.
useCases.beforeState: Manual temperature logs, reactive problem discovery, compliance gaps
useCases.afterState: Automated sensor data capture, predictive alerts, voice-based corrective actions

useCases.title: Multi-Location Operations
useCases.description: Restaurant chains or multi-site operations need standardized forms across locations with real-time visibility.
useCases.beforeState: Inconsistent forms per location, no visibility into execution, manual data aggregation
useCases.afterState: Centralized form builder, automated instance generation, real-time analytics dashboard
